data.description:
FIGHT together against different enemies in the Hex7 Battle Arena.
DEFEND yourself with shield and sword and don't forget to RELOAD your guns once in awhile.
![{"height":1440,"type":"image","width":2560}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/38974468_332017743231769_3438180485989163490_n.png?_nc_cat=105&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=a0whufylYe4Q7kNvgFc4t59&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AfCpbT8RGGBp_gtgx_97hphpS41GLmx6uLvd-meJ5h0Q7w&oe=663E0337)
SURVIVE the first 7 ROUNDS.
Have FUN customizing your game a much as you like.
![{"height":1440,"type":"image","width":2560}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/75507168_1446865232891556_3763410573840822716_n.png?_nc_cat=109&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=_1EvsUw3sxIQ7kNvgGJUT-1&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AfC68LZfRNSlQ8tbqszaWKDMvrktSTucfEzFVoQRmXFLrw&oe=663E10D2)
EXPLORE the Arenas and enjoy the different game modes.
![{"height":1440,"type":"image","width":2560}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/38982555_716104293832637_6157177355803125122_n.png?_nc_cat=102&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=5TYDYrgrsPkQ7kNvgEScFgm&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AfAvbfQsVsxKEcX3X4qREUkP436q00MSl0uGkZL9R6jzsw&oe=663E1450)
